effect.text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to search your deck for any card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cost.description: Discard 2 other cards from your hand

requirements.description: Must have at least 2 other cards in hand to discard

tips: Save for when you need a specific card to win
Discard cards you can recover later
One of the most powerful trainers ever printed
Use draw Trainers first to increase hand size before using
Computer Search for Item Finder can create a pseudo-infinite loop

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 2 other cards from your hand to use Computer Search; you cannot use it with fewer than 2 other cards in hand
You can search for any card in your deck: Pokemon, Trainer, or Energy
You must shuffle your deck after searching, even if you don't find a card (if your deck is empty)
The cards you discard are chosen by you, not your opponent
Computer Search itself does not count toward the discard requirement
You must show the card you find to your opponent (standard search procedure)
If you have no cards in your deck, you cannot use Computer Search (nothing to search)
You can choose to discard Energy or other important cards if that's all you have
Computer Search resolves completely before you can play the card you searched for
You cannot use Computer Search if you only have Computer Search in hand (need 2 other cards to discard)
